title: Ticket #4790: condor_qedit core dumps on unrecognized command line flag
description:
When running condor_qedit if you specify an unrecognized option such as -h or -asdf a segfault occurs. It also crashes if you specify a valid option such as -debug without a cluster and attribute name/value pair.

$ condor_qedit -h Segmentation fault

$ condor_qedit -asdf Segmentation fault

$ condor_qedit -debug Segmentation fault

$ condor_qedit 61761 hi there Set attribute "hi".

$ condor_version $CondorVersion: 8.2.5 Nov 26 2014 BuildID: 284806 $ $CondorPlatform: x86_64_Debian7 $
remarks:
2015-Nov-03 16:02:39 by zmiller:
This was fixed in #4912, abandoning this ticket.
creator: wenger
